title: Ampersand Energy Opens Its Battery Swap Network To Global Electric Motorcycle Manufacturers
description:
Ampersand Energy recently announced a partnership to run the Wylex electric motorcycle on its batteries and existing swap network across East Africa. This marks a major step forward for Ampersand, one of the pioneers of electric transport in Africa, and for Wylex Mobility, a leading electric motorcycle manufacturer. The partnership ... [continued]

The post Ampersand Energy Opens Its Battery Swap Network To Global Electric Motorcycle Manufacturers appeared first on CleanTechnica.
